methods.name: updatePosition
methods.description: There are some custom scenarios for which Quasar cannot automatically reposition the tooltip without significant performance drawbacks so the optimal solution is for you to call this method when you need it
methods.description_zh: 对于某些自定义方案，Quasar 无法在不出现明显性能缺陷的情况下自动重新定位工具提示，因此最佳解决方案是在需要时调用此方法

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when showing/hidden state changes; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 在显示/隐藏状态更改时触发;也被 v-model 使用

max-height.description: The maximum height of the Tooltip; Size in CSS units, including unit name
max-height.description_zh: Tooltip 的最大高度;以 CSS 单位为单位的大小，包括单位名称
max-height.desc: The maximum height of the Tooltip; Size in CSS units, including unit name

max-width.description: The maximum width of the Tooltip; Size in CSS units, including unit name
max-width.description_zh: Tooltip 的最大宽度;以 CSS 单位为单位的大小，包括单位名称
max-width.desc: The maximum width of the Tooltip; Size in CSS units, including unit name

anchor.type: top left / top middle / top right / top start / top end / center left / center middle / center right / center start / center end / bottom left / bottom middle / bottom right / bottom start / bottom end
anchor.description: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the Tooltip relative to its target
anchor.description_zh: 两个值，用于设置 Tooltip 相对于其目标的起始位置或锚点

self.type: top left / top middle / top right / top start / top end / center left / center middle / center right / center start / center end / bottom left / bottom middle / bottom right / bottom start / bottom end
self.description: Two values setting the Tooltip's own position relative to its target
self.description_zh: 两个值设置 Tooltip 自身相对于其目标的位置

offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the Tooltip horizontally and vertically in pixels
offset.description_zh: 一个包含两个数字的数组，用于在水平和垂直方向上偏移工具提示（以像素为单位）

delay.description: Configure Tooltip to appear with delay
delay.description_zh: 将工具提示配置为延迟显示

hide-delay.description: Configure Tooltip to disappear with delay
hide-delay.description_zh: 将工具提示配置为延迟消失

persistent.description: Prevents Tooltip from auto-closing when app's route changes
persistent.description_zh: 防止 Tooltip 在应用程序的路由更改时自动关闭

v-model.description: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 定义显示/隐藏状态的组件模型;使用此属性（以及 'update：model-value' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令

target.description: Configure a target element to trigger component toggle; 'true' means it enables the parent DOM element, 'false' means it disables attaching events to any DOM elements; By using a String (CSS selector) or a DOM element it attaches the events to the specified DOM element (if it exists)
target.description_zh: 配置目标元素以触发组件切换;'true' 表示启用父 DOM 元素，'false' 表示禁用将事件附加到任何 DOM 元素;通过使用 String（CSS 选择器）或 DOM 元素，它将事件附加到指定的 DOM 元素（如果存在）

no-parent-event.description: Skips attaching events to the target DOM element (that trigger the element to get shown)
no-parent-event.description_zh: 跳过将事件附加到目标 DOM 元素（触发元素显示）

transition-duration.description_zh: 过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位，不含单位）
